column4: is there no way to empty the rubbish bin on a usb storage device?
unmounting doesn't do it?  I vaguely remember that suggestion once
I don't know then :/  What happens when you try to use the GUI to empty trash?  You could always just delete the relevant directory on the usb, but again, I don't know if there is a better way
I see.  Well is just deleting the trash directory on the usb a possibility?
that sounds odd.  What did you delete exactly?
you could log in as a new user and then empty the trash, though you probably consider that a hack too
what is used to search for fixed names or complete package name?
aptitude search '~nri'   will return only packages with "ri" in their names.  What did you want it to do?
search from within the program.,and get only the packages that match ri completely.

you can use regex in the search.  You would never want to search for exactly the package "ri" though because, well obviously there's only one package with the name exactly "ri".  But using regex: aptitude search '~n^ri$'.  I never cared for aptitude's curses interface
regexes function in curses mode too.
